questions.question: According to Qur'an 3:185, what will every soul taste?
What does death represent according to the lesson?
options: A transition from this temporary world to the eternal Hereafter

questions.question: Why should we remember death frequently?
options: To keep our hearts focused on what truly matters and prioritize good deeds

questions.question: Who alone decides when each person's life will end?
How do the angels extract the soul of a believer?
options: Roughly like thorns tearing through wet wool
Gently like water flowing from a pitcher

questions.question: What do the angels bring to believers when taking their souls?
options: Glad tidings of Allah's mercy, Paradise, and eternal peace

questions.question: According to Qur'an 16:32, what do the angels say to the good souls?
options: Your time has come to leave
Peace be upon you. Enter Paradise for what you used to do

questions.question: What determines how the angels take our soul?
options: How many people attend our funeral

questions.question: What is wrapped in fragrant shrouds from Paradise?
What happens when the believer's soul reaches each heaven's gate?
options: The angels welcome it joyfully and open the gates

questions.question: What happens to the disbeliever's soul at the first heaven's gate?
options: It is rejected and thrown back down to earth violently
It is welcomed like the believer's soul
It slowly descends over many days

questions.question: According to Qur'an 7:40, what will not be opened for those who deny Allah's verses?
How many angels come to question people in the grave?
options: Two angels named Munkar and Nakir

questions.question: What are the three questions asked in the grave?
options: Who is your Lord? What is your religion? Who is your Prophet?
Did you pray? Did you fast? Did you give charity?
Where are you from? Who are your parents? What did you do?
Do you believe? Do you repent? Do you remember?

questions.question: What happens to the believer's grave after answering correctly?
options: The angels make it spacious, comfortable, and filled with light

questions.question: According to Qur'an 14:27, who does Allah keep firm in this life and the Hereafter?
options: Those who memorized the entire Qur'an
Those who lived to old age

questions.question: What is Barzakh?
options: The barrier world between death and the Day of Judgment

questions.question: Can anyone return from Barzakh to this world to fix their mistakes?
options: Yes, if they ask Allah sincerely
No, once death comes our record is sealed permanently
Yes, but only prophets can return
Yes, for a few hours only

questions.question: What does the soul experience in Barzakh?
options: Either comfort or torment based on earthly deeds

questions.question: According to Qur'an 23:100, what is before people until they are resurrected?
What can save us from the grave's punishment?
options: Being buried in a special place
Having many people at our funeral

questions.question: What are some specific sins people are punished for in the grave?
options: Backbiting, lying, not cleaning properly after using the bathroom, or abandoning prayer

questions.question: According to Sahih Bukhari 1377, what did the Prophet ﷺ seek refuge from?
Who experiences punishment in the grave?
options: Those who died in disbelief or with major unrepented sins
Only people who lived long lives
Only those who were buried improperly

questions.question: What does the believer's grave feel like?
options: Soft like silk with pleasant light

questions.question: What opens in the righteous believer's grave?
options: A door to their old home
A window to Paradise showing their future home

questions.question: What does the righteous believer's grave become?
According to Qur'an 41:30, what do angels tell those who say 'Our Lord is Allah' and remain steadfast?
options: Do not fear and do not grieve but receive good tidings of Paradise

questions.question: How do souls of believers meet in Barzakh?
options: They meet and recognize one another from their earthly lives

questions.question: What do deceased believers' souls ask about when a righteous person dies?
options: Their loved ones still living on earth

questions.question: How do souls react when learning a loved one died in faith?
According to Sahih Bukhari 3336, what are souls compared to?
Why did the Prophet ﷺ Muhammad ﷺ encourage visiting graves?
options: To remind us of death and the Hereafter
To count how many people have died

questions.question: What should we say when visiting graves?
options: Peace be upon you, O inhabitants of the graves
Goodbye to those who have left us
We remember your names and stories
May you rest in eternal sleep

questions.question: What should we do for the deceased when visiting?
options: Make sincere prayers asking Allah to forgive them

questions.question: According to Sahih Muslim 976, what do graves remind us of?
What should we seek refuge from in every prayer?
options: The punishment of the grave and the trial of the Dajjal

questions.question: Which surah protects from grave punishment when recited regularly?
What are our best shields against grave punishment?
Which of these protects from the grave's punishment?
options: Sincere faith in Allah and dying as a martyr
Being buried in an expensive grave
Being very old when we die

questions.question: What happens to martyrs after death?
options: They wait in Barzakh like everyone else
They experience the grave's trial immediately
They must answer the angels' questions first
Their souls go directly to Paradise

questions.question: Where do the martyrs' souls live?
options: Inside green birds that roam Paradise freely

questions.question: How much of death's pain do martyrs feel?
According to Qur'an 3:169, what are martyrs doing with their Lord?
What happens to major sinners who died believing?
options: They will eventually enter Paradise after purification

questions.question: How should reflecting on death and the grave affect us?
options: Make us completely afraid to live
Have no effect on our daily lives
Motivate us toward good deeds, not paralyze us with fear
Make us stop all worldly activities

questions.question: What does sincere repentance before death do to our sins?
options: Has no effect on past sins

questions.question: According to Qur'an 39:53, what does Allah say to those who have transgressed?
options: Do not despair of the mercy of Allah. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins
Your sins are too many to be forgiven
Only some sins can be forgiven
